title: Real-World Scientific Problem-Solving Project in Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Conducting real-life science projects to address local community issues.

learning_goals: Learners can scientifically analyze one local environmental issue using a mobile app.
Learners gain experience in conducting team projects using digital collaboration tools through five or more microlearning modules.
Learners can propose at least one science-based, actionable problem-solving solution after completing the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
